places_with_reviews.name: Nageshwar Temple
places_with_reviews.address: Ambawade, Bhor, Maharashtra, 3QCR+P5P, Ambawade, Maharashtra 412206, India

reviews.text: Beautiful ancient temple, very quite place with water stream on one side. No cleanliness, not well maintained. This is the best example of how ignorance of local authorities can ruin the beautiful places like this.

The Nageshwar temple is built 2000 years ago by naag tribes community.
This place is very nice and situated on river.
Ancient temple which has undergone multiple restoration. Beautiful temple with the water stream on one side.
Off beat visit. No restaurants near by. Ideal and quiet place. On the way to Kengalgad and Rayreshwar.
The temple is 2000 yrs old. The surrounding is very calm. If ur near bhor and got some time then u can visit it. There's a runnel there and the water is clean to get refreshed.

places_with_reviews.name: Swami samarth temple Bhor

reviews.text: Beautiful temple of lord Swami Samarth. Specially you can visit here in July to September, there is lot of greenery surrounding the temple
Amazing temple with very clean and peaceful environment..
Visiting this temple not only gives you peace within but also pulls you closer to nature. Well maintained temple. Also shelter is there to avoid rain and heat.

This Temple is Shree Swami Samartha Maharaj Temple owner is Rayrikar Mukunda....
This Temple area is Look Like same of Akkalkot Swami samartha maharaj....
Awesome place for yog kriya & meditation also.......

Amazing temple with very clean and peaceful environment. When I visited this place for the very first time with my family we all loved it due to amazing Shri Swami Samarth Murti and overall environment of the temple. Must visit place if you are visiting Bhor.

places_with_reviews.name: Bhordara view point

reviews.text:
At the end of August month we are experiencing new kinds of flowers that are growing over here and have some similarities to flowers growing over Kaas plateau. These flowers are grown over here and are grown over a few patches. This place is wonderful for evening walks. People from Bhor city use to visit and exercise at this place. Best time to visit in Monsoon and Winters. This place is well known but only few are visiting the place.
People who are nomadic they bring their cows and buffaloes for fodder. No disturbance for people who are visiting this place. So for yoga, peaceful natural time spending, bringing beloved family members must consider this place 😀

Best place to visit if you want to have a view of Bhor city and the outskirts. No crowd at all, that's what makes this such a quiet and relaxing place outside the Bhor city. Best to visit in the rainy season as there is so much greenery and clouds literally going over your head which makes this such a surreal experience. Underrated place. Must visit
